answers.answer: The best thing you cna do for yourself and your babyis to have excellent blood sugar control.  YOu didn't say if you take insulin, but usually this is the first treatment for persons with diabetes.You will need to contorl your diet and avoid junk food and minimise carbs.You also need to exercise regularly.Target blood sugars in pregnancy are fasting and before meals of < 95 and 2 hours post eating of < 120, and never over 140.This is achievable and the result will be a beautiful and healthy baby.
